title: Manager of Software and Technical Projects
details: We are seeking an experienced Technical Project Manager to lead software development teams and manage client relationships. This role requires strong leadership skills, technical understanding, and the ability to deliver complex projects on time and within budget.
requirements: 5+ years of technical project management experience
Knowledge of Agile and Scrum methodologies
responsibilities: Manage client expectations and project scope
Create and maintain project timelines and budgets
Facilitate communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders
Ensure quality delivery and client satisfaction
legalStatus: H1B sponsorship available, open to visa holders
